title_full: SAP25-BP01 Evaluate SAP architecture patterns to improve environmental sustainability
title: Evaluate SAP architecture patterns to improve environmental sustainability
description: Evaluate SAP architecture patterns that reduce environmental impact including system consolidation, efficient resource utilization, and cloud-native architectures. Consider SAP Business Technology Platform services to reduce infrastructure footprint for specific workloads.

title_full: SAP25-BP02 Select AWS Regions with lower carbon intensity
title: Select AWS Regions with lower carbon intensity
description: Consider the carbon intensity of AWS Regions when selecting where to deploy SAP workloads. AWS publishes information about renewable energy usage by Region. Balance sustainability goals with performance, compliance, and data residency requirements.

title_full: SAP26-BP01 Optimize compute utilization for SAP workloads
title: Optimize compute utilization for SAP workloads
description: Maximize compute utilization by right-sizing SAP instances to match actual workload requirements. Avoid over-provisioning that leads to idle resources. Monitor utilization metrics and adjust capacity to maintain efficient resource usage.

title_full: SAP26-BP02 Implement power management for non-production SAP systems
title: Implement power management for non-production SAP systems
description: Reduce energy consumption by stopping non-production SAP systems during periods of inactivity. Implement automated schedules aligned with working hours and demand patterns. Use serverless or managed services where possible to benefit from efficient multi-tenant infrastructure.

title_full: SAP27-BP01 Use efficient storage configurations for SAP workloads
title: Use efficient storage configurations for SAP workloads
description: Configure storage efficiently by using appropriate volume sizes and performance characteristics. Avoid over-provisioning IOPS and throughput beyond actual requirements. Use storage tiering to move infrequently accessed data to energy-efficient storage classes.

title_full: SAP27-BP02 Implement SAP data lifecycle management for sustainability
title: Implement SAP data lifecycle management for sustainability
description: Implement SAP data lifecycle management to archive and delete data that is no longer needed for business operations. Reduce storage footprint and energy consumption by retaining only necessary data. Use SAP ILM and archiving solutions integrated with Amazon S3 storage classes.

title_full: SAP28-BP01 Review usage for opportunities to optimize sustainability
title: Review usage for opportunities to optimize sustainability
description: Regularly review SAP workload resource usage to identify sustainability optimization opportunities. Use AWS Customer Carbon Footprint Tool to understand and track the carbon emissions associated with your SAP workloads. Set sustainability goals and track progress over time.

title_full: SAP28-BP02 Measure and report on SAP workload carbon footprint
title: Measure and report on SAP workload carbon footprint
description: Use AWS Customer Carbon Footprint Tool to measure the carbon emissions of your SAP workloads. Include sustainability metrics in regular workload reviews and report progress to stakeholders. Consider sustainability impact when making architectural decisions.
